positions.title: DevMountain Student Developers
positions.description:
I got the idea for this eCommerce site, because I saw that a local restaurant currently didn't have a decent website associated with it. The concept was to make it possible for customers to order take out or delivery through the site itself through Stripe. The customer would also be about to view their past orders.

Won runner-up at DevMountain for best business solution.

This is their current site http://www.saigoncafeprovo.biz/
To see my entire website please go to: http://saigoncafe.devmtn-projects.com

TECH USED: React/Redux | HTML | CSS | JavaScript | Node | Express | PostgreSQL
GITHUB REPO: https://github.com/brownrnoah/Personal-Project
…

Title
Web Developer | React/Redux | HTML | CSS | JavaScript | Node | Express | PostgreSQL
positions.description:
The concept for this site is to connect local food pantries and food banks with local restaurants and stores that have goods that are getting close to expiring or that they no longer need. The business would receive tax refunds for the amount that they donate. It will give small businesses an opportunity to help the local community.

To see my entire website please go to: http://food-connect.net

TECH USED: React/Redux | HTML | CSS | JavaScript | Node | Express | PostgreSQL
GITHUB REPO: https://github.com/ScottWorks/Food-Connect

positions.title: Shop Hand
positions.description:
• Load and unload trucks.
• Turn in receipts and money received from deliveries.
• Maintain cleanliness around the shop.
• Wash, vacuum, and wax the work trucks.
• Receive deliveries, sometimes with the use of a forklift.
• Deliver parts, and supplies needed at job sites around Southern Illinois.
• Sometimes requiring the need to pick up supplies at a distributor.
• Maintain the lawn care at the shop.
